properties.areaDesc: Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 7 at 3:43AM EST until January 8 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Small Craft Advisory, expect sustained winds
up to 26 knots from the northwest with gusts up to 31 knots.
The largest significant waves will be 7 feet with a potential
maximum wave height of 10 feet. During the Gale Watch, expect
sustained winds up to 30 knots from the south with gusts up to
35 knots. The largest significant waves will be 8 feet with a
potential maximum wave height of 11 feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI.

* WHEN...During the Small Craft Advisory, the maximum winds are
expected around 8 AM EST Wednesday with the largest waves
expected around 9 AM EST Wednesday. During the Gale Watch, the
maximum winds are expected around 3 PM EST Thursday with the
largest waves expected around 4 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
